Quote: People will forget what you said and did, but they will never forget how you made them feel.
Author: Maya Angelo

Quote: I am not an angel, ' I asserted;' and I will not be one till I die: I will be myself. Mr. Rochester, you must neither expect nor exact anything celestial of me - for you will not get it, any more than I shall get it of you: which I do not at all anticipate.
Author: Jane Eyre

Quote: Lighthouses don’t go running all over an island looking for boats to save they just stand there shining.
Author: Anne Lamott
